website_summaries.verdict: The combination of its skid-resistant design, practical size, and soft, memory foam core, make it an excellent pick for most bathrooms as well as a good value.
pros: Polyester construction with soft memory foam core
Does a good job absorbing water
Slip-resistant backing keeps in in place
Size fits nicely in most spaces
cons: Takes a little while to dry, and may flatten out with repeated washings

customer_reviews.title: Mat Falls Apart During First Wash
customer_reviews.text: Although the mat works well at retaining water and is comfortable to stand on, the bottom of the mat was so poorly constructed that it fell apart the first time it was washed, which released the foam inside throughout my washing machine. The label indicates it is safe to machine wash and dry. Considering the quality of this mat, I felt it was very overpriced, and I would suggest finding a better quality bathmat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Laurence

customer_reviews.title: Great value, absorbs water and doesn't stay wet
customer_reviews.text: Update: I bought a second sage bathmat to use along the first. To my surprise, there was noticeable color variation. In the attached photo, you can see one of the mats is clearly darker, especially along the border. Be wary if you want to match two bathmats. -- This bathmat is high quality for the price. The memory foam is thick, and the reverse side doesn't slide at all on my tile floor. The mat absorbs water well and doesn't stay wet too long. I'll update after a few months to see how it holds up against mold. I wish it came it larger sizes though, 18" is quite small.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne L

customer_reviews.title: Not washing machine safe as advertized
customer_reviews.text: The mat is soft and squishy and nice on your feet ....but it said it was safe to machine wash and it is NOT. As the pictures show it got ripped apart. The washing machine also got damaged by the mat; where the plastic rim had been smooth and white it is now rough and brown/discolored. I do not recommend this mat since it's important to wash your bathmat!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gifford

customer_reviews.title: it's fine, does the job
customer_reviews.text: it's fine, does the job, holds water for a while, so can be kinda gross to step on if you forget and are wearing socks.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah C

customer_reviews.title: This mat looks and feels great, but I am disappointed in its durability
customer_reviews.text: This mat looks and feels great, but I am disappointed in its durability. After one wash, which complied with all instructions on the product label, I noticed that the stitching and anti-slip material on the bottom of the mat started to come undone and fray. I can understand wear and tear after extensive use over time, but given that I've only washed it once, I would have expected this item to have held up better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but the stitching started falling apart after two months of use. I have had it for three months and am confident that l have resewn the entire thing by now. If l could return it for a refund l would. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PIECE OF JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie gallagher

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.text: These things are the bomb. Very comfy on the tootsies when standing for any length, and my dog LOVES them spaced here and there so he has a nice place to lie down when not near his bed. I appreciate the reasonable price. My only complaint is that they don't come in more colors and sizes. If they came in larger sizes, I'd buy some for the local dog shelter. Great option since they are washable.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Thick and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this along with Magnificent 20 X 32 inch Memory Foam Bath Mat (B015AV735S) to cover both sink and bath floor area and I can say that AmazonBasics's bath mat is much more comfy. While Magnificent's bath mat is larger and doesn't show much foot prints, it's thinner and less water absorbing. Speaking of foot prints, based on the reviews I thought it will show a lot of them but so far it doesn't after a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Will spoil your feet
customer_reviews.text: We keep one of these in front of our kitchen sink on top of the hardwoods. This is our second one. It is one of those things that you don’t give much thought to until it is there. Our last one looked awful and had served it’s usefulness so we tossed it, I had done half the dishes that night and realized there was something significantly different. Realized it was standing on the hardwoods at the end of a long day. Dried my hands off, ordered a replacement...next time I will not throw one away until it’s replacement is on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It surprised me..
customer_reviews.text: ..How much I ended up loving this product. I purchased this on a whim, having gone through several bath mats in the past that I haven't exactly fancied. It's been months now with constant use and the mat has not worn down. It is still as plush and comfortable as ever and kept its rich brown colour. What I love is that it stays clean despite me not having the time to clean it often! Full marks on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Manufactured
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk... Poor workmanship and quality control apparently non existent.. Big machining strip right through the middle of the mat with fabric hanging out.. To bulky and difficult to pack for return, so I'll have to just eat it...
customer_reviews.author: Monte Huff

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: For the inexpensive price, I was expecting average quality, but I was pleasantly surprised. I bought two of these memory foam mats and the quality is great. They’re very soft and they do a good job of absorbing water when stepping out of the bath. The brown is also a true brown color (not faded at all). It’s also a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: Slips and slides.
customer_reviews.text: This rug is terrible. It slips when you walk off of it. I am constantly adjusting it. It does leave footprints. I am going to throw it out before I fall!
customer_reviews.author: puzzlewiz

customer_reviews.title: Makes my feet look small, but great product for keeping your floor dry and your feet comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This does everything you want it to! soaks up any excess water that may get on the floor. The felt finish feels nice under your feet and the sponge-like material is pleasant. The moisture also wicks away from the mat quickly and it always feels dry the next day! Four stars because my dog had an accident on it, and now I have to buy a new one =(. Otherwise its a great product to have in your bathroom and I reccomend it higly! Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Jex Rap

customer_reviews.title: Very nice to step on
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to step on. The only issue I have with it is the outside material changes tones when rubbed. So it will have different tones of brown at all times unless you brush it in one direction after each use. I am too OCD for this product.
customer_reviews.author: wackums

customer_reviews.title: Why do white silicon beads pour out of these mats? Why the constant foot prints?
customer_reviews.text: The mats leave prints, we have memory foam pillows that DON'T leave prints so these mats are basically better used for place mats, so thin too!...And even after washed tiny white beads pop out of them . WASTED money! Going to JCP, good deals , can see the quality upfront. Amazon is getting lower grade with products for sale. Amazon spread into too many areas that they forgot quality of what people want to buy online which basically every store has free shipping now so that's not a plus so much anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Non-Slip
customer_reviews.text: The top is decent, a fair amount of cush and the fabric is good, but the backing is sub-par, more of a plastic feel than rubber and they slide all over my kitchen floor. I bought these on two different occasions, different color, same result.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Williams

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to replace a rug
customer_reviews.text: Its really soft. It wis much easier to clean than the rug I previously had. Just a quick sweep over at its clean. It doesn't seem to absorb dust into itself just moisture and it dries quick. Mind you, I haven't put through rigorous water testing, just light water spills. No problem
customer_reviews.author: giyk

customer_reviews.title: The beige rug was almost white
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the color because it was not even close. I bought the rug to help my old dog get over the top stair, so I was happy that the rug gripped the floor well. It seems to be well made, but that light color doesn't match at all, and it's going to be hard to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Phl.413

customer_reviews.title: Soft Bath Mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little bath mat! I am loving it's soft skwishy-ness when exiting the shower. It is warm and soft. I haven't tried to clean it yet but it says it is machine washable but it doesn't seem like it would be difficult so I'll take a leap of faith and trust. The color selection might grow a little though and maybe it will. I might consider purchasing another for my other bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Hillier

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than I was expecting (I guess I should have measured...) and though it doesn’t slip when you’re standing on it, if there’s no pressure it slides too easily across a tile floor so gets “out of place” daily. I won’t return it as it works ok but also won’t be buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Jess K

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I have to say that I don't use them for bath mats, but for pet beds in various places as I have several cats and I'm also a pet sitter and board pets. They are holding up very well, wash easily and feel very comfortable. Most importantly, the pets keep returning so I know they are comfortable for them to lie on. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Really cheap looking and weird size
customer_reviews.text: its like a square .. weird awkward size, and the cheap material glistens ... the memorial foam is sticky... almost creepy. Plz don't buy this piece of trash.
customer_reviews.author: Rachna Chopra

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but noisy
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but it makes a plastic-y noise when you step on them and the contrast of color when you step on them make them look untidy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy to stand on, soaks up a lot of water. That's the problem....it soaks it up and it doesn't dry, hubby stepped on it in his socks hours after anyone took a shower, and it was like stepping in a puddle. Trying to figure out someplace else to ise it.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Bridges Kelley

customer_reviews.title: It slips
customer_reviews.text: Backing does not hold on to the floor. Mat slides all over the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Wy

customer_reviews.title: Probably a grear floormatt in the bathroom ?
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a bathtub matt. Its horrible underwater!! My own fault. Hard for me to get used to i can dry it out. Will use for the dog to lay on!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got the 4 pack of these in beige and it’s only been one day with these and I’m extremely satisfied. I have gotten memory foam mats on amazon and these are the plushest ones so far. The texture is also super soft. I’ll update how they hold up after washing
customer_reviews.author: Vetyaz

customer_reviews.title: Gray is actually dark gray/charcoal
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. I needed a specific size for my guest bathroom, and that led me to this item, The color is described as gray, but it’s actually a dark gray/charcoal. It’s too dark for my bathroom (really stands out), so I’ll have to see if there’s another place in the house I can use it. If you want dark gray, then it seems like a nice mat.
customer_reviews.author: Chocoholic

customer_reviews.title: This bath mat feels great under my feet when I get out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I did like it at first, but after several weeks of use it changed color around the edges and had to toss it. I ended up purchasing a machine washable mat from Target. No memory foam there, but it's washable and as there is no memory foam, I expect the color will not change. No more memory foam bath mats for me!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy R

customer_reviews.title: Thick and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love this bath mat. I've bought this twice for two different bathrooms at two different houses. Only con is that for both bathrooms at both houses, the door can't close where the bath mat is installed. It's rather thick and gets caught. But quality and comfort of these pads are great!
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: A little too thick
customer_reviews.text: I have a cramped bathroom (although its fair by NYC standards) but the door is supposed to be able to glide over my bathmat. This mat, as nice as it is, is too thick for the door. I have to push the door over the mat and it usually gets stuck when I try to close the door. BUT it is a quality mat that is comfortable under the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, doesn't slip, and absorbent
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for the RV bathroom. The cat likes it, too!
customer_reviews.author: Camiemom

customer_reviews.title: Feels Great!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to feel like you're stepping on a cloud while exiting your bath or shower, look no further. While this isn't the thickest memory foam it still feels fantastic to step on. The fabric is very soft and feels warm under the toes. Would absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Must have bath mat!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST memory foam bath mats I've ever seen/felt. Absolutely wonderful and extremely cushy. I wish they had several colors available in the four pack at a decent price as I would definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat,so comfortable and looks great in my bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Chanell Coleman

customer_reviews.title: memory foam is the best!! Only issue I have is the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: memory foam is the best!! Only issue I have is the bottom being rubber - the water seeps underneath from the shower. I wish it had a material that could soak it up but... maybe my problem the shower squirts water? :)
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: VERY THICK. It's the kind of fabric that you can wipe one way and it's light and the other way it's dark. I don't care for that cuz basically it's a mat with your Toe marks and footprints showing. it's also a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Murphy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: too squishy and nearly caused me to fall. gave it away.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Wickham

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME RUG!
customer_reviews.text: It's been about a two weeks and the rug looks soft and clean still!!! Also the texture of the rug has a velvet feel to it! It absorbed water beautifully so it doesn't appear wet until it is stepped on! I will purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Cgarci20

customer_reviews.title: Quickly absorbs water in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: We love how soft and how quickly it absorbs water from the shower. It is a little stiff though, so we aren't sure how to go about cleaning it yet. We originally bought this product to avoid mold growth and after about two months, we have no signs of mold (our old bathmat grew mold within a week).
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Matos

customer_reviews.title: Good value but surface shows dark patterns from velvet like top material and foot prints
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Good value Only negative is that the velvet like top shows dark patterns from footprints that look like dirt even when clean. Unless, brushed after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Expo Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bath mat for my new master bathroom. I was impressed with how thick and soft this mat was. It feels luxurious and I love stepping on it when I get out of my shower. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfy on the feet
customer_reviews.text: Don't ruin your lovely shower experience by stepping out of the shower on to anything but this mat. It's soft, and fluffy on the toes. It's just feels so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Provan

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Our old bathmat had worn all the way through and this one was just as comfortable and has held up quite well so far. As an added bonus, our cat loves to use it like a memory foam mattress when we aren't using it after a shower.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Okay, color doesn't match exactly the photo. Soft and comfy though.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, the grey doesn't match exactly like the photo, it looks more like blue-gray in real life. But hard to compare with different computer screens. Also note, it makes foot marks/prints when you step on them due to the felt like material. Otherwise, it is soft and comfy on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Matches the colors of our bathroom beautifully! It’s very soft and cushion-y and saves bare feet from the unforgivingly cold floor lol. Great quality too! Doesn’t slip on your floor!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: Suuupppeerrr nice! It’s thicker, softer, more absorbent, and higher quality than expected. It’s literally like memory foam. I have always bought mats from Walmart, BB&B, TJ Max, etc...and have never gotten this quality. Maybe I’ve been ignorant to what I should have been buying, but this is surely a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EpiNupe

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: Very thin I’ve owned better ones. Wish I could return but I threw away the box they came in. I will be donating them instead. Do yourself a favor and look for better quality elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Good size and soft
customer_reviews.text: I have a smaller one for the kitchen. I bought this one to match my gray set for the bathroom. Great size for in front of the tub or bathroom sink!
customer_reviews.author: Alyse N Smalls

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and the right price.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and the right price. I purchased this not to use as an actual bathmat, but as a cushion on the seat of my infrared sauna. It's the perfect size, and makes the wood bench so much more comfortable to sit on for any length of time! I love the color, the photos don't do it justice, and the fact that I can throw it into the washing machine after using a couple of times is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love when amazon basic is exactly what you’re looking for and perfect! They’re soft and absorbent and the color matches perfectly to the picture!
customer_reviews.author: SarahB

customer_reviews.title: They feel and look great. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended. I wish it was a little heavier/stickier in the bottom so it doesn't move around as much (in comparison to some of the larger/heavier memory foam mats I bought from Costco..). However for the price there's no reason to buy something else. They feel great and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Feels soft under feet and absorbs water
customer_reviews.text: I have these all over the house, outside shower, on floor by kitchen sink, outside and inside door to pool and yard. Under dogs biwls
customer_reviews.author: deborah M Pavlick

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not for anyone with a disabled family member
customer_reviews.text: This is as advertised a memory foam mat. While most will find it fine to have in their bathroom those of us with someone disabled will find it is a bit too thick and those with issues like my wife will have an issue with it. She tripped over it and was lucky that I was there to save her on the way down to the tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Crowley

customer_reviews.title: I have recieved so many compliment on this rug
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug! I got it to go in front of the bathroom sink and everyone who comes to my house compliments it and asks where I got it. Its so soft and brushes off easily with a broom.
customer_reviews.author: jones

customer_reviews.title: best non slip memory form bath mat ever
customer_reviews.text: very nice and easy to care for. wish I could get some more at the price that I got them for. do not want every be with out them
customer_reviews.author: best shelving unit

customer_reviews.title: These Are NOT Non-Slip!
customer_reviews.text: While these are extremely soft and cushiony, they are NOT non-slip. Move all over the place making them dangerous in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: sanda52

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Uhm, non slip my a**... this thing slides around everywhere and it’s so ugly. Memory foam on the feet of course is nice, but it just looks so cheap and dirty because foot prints shows.
customer_reviews.author: THELASHMOVE | Kaytlin

customer_reviews.title: get this bath mat, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: this bath mat is so soft to the touch and sometimes i dont want to stop standing on it. it really soaks up water more than most mats i've had. fairly easy to wipe little lint particles and such right off. still hasn't been washed yet, hopefully it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Hubby likes his new bathroom rug.
customer_reviews.text: Thicker than I thought it would be. Had to wash it right away because the dog laid on it with muddy paws. Held up fine. Like the color I chose. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Fields

customer_reviews.title: Go for a better brand..
customer_reviews.text: The utility of the product is good, it does the job, but looks absolutely terrible after getting a little wet from simple daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Ndk

customer_reviews.title: Please make it larger - love it! No slipping!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Need it to be bigger though please. So soft. Does not budge on floor and we have smooth tile. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Serve the purpose
customer_reviews.text: The rugs are soft and absorbent, but slide on the floor so are not as safe as I had hoped for getting out of the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Lady

customer_reviews.title: It's large enough and look great. But is was not what I wanted for ...
customer_reviews.text: It's large enough and look great. But is was not what I wanted for the inside of the shower. I am using it as a mat when you leave the shower and it works great and stays in place/ Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: patricia chan

customer_reviews.title: Small soft mats that are not non slip.
customer_reviews.text: The mats are soft and absorbent. I wish it were a little bigger. It slides around so I don’t find it to be non slip at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: What a blessing
customer_reviews.text: With hardwood floors and tile having a soft cushion under your feet while you’re getting ready in the morning is a blessing
customer_reviews.author: vegastracy

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, Amazon basics doesn't disappoint Updated Review: With extended use, the mat doesn't seem to hold its own. Like another reviewer stated, the water just sits on the surface, which makes the mat take forever to dry -- if it ever does.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: Update: These have almost no grip so the slide out of place constantly. I would recommend a mat underneath to hold in place unfortunately. Solid bath mats for a good price. Grey is nice and dark.
customer_reviews.author: Catie M

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our guest bathroom. Our guest loves it! Only thing is I wish it was bigger. It's very soft and nice to step out of the shower and onto this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bathroom mat or anywhere rug
customer_reviews.text: I bought a grey and a sage. I have a Victorian Green bathroom. Also a Smokey blue and grey bathroom. These are so soft on your feet especially in front of my petistal sink as I groom or do make up pretty vacvumed and wash well
customer_reviews.author: RAINASADDICTEDTOAMAZON

customer_reviews.title: Great mat, not so great non slip backing.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderfully squishy memory foam mat that I use everywhere. However, if you're looking for one that has a very good nonslip bottom, this is not the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: D. KimTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: These mats slide around a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the mats as a safety net after knee surgery, to prevent falling in the bathroom. Instead, they slide around and were actually a greater danger. I will be donating them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Bennett

customer_reviews.title: This thing will not get dry
customer_reviews.text: After 1 shower, I had it sitting out for 3 days and ran it through the dryer twice. It's STILL wet. Such a shame because it is soft and a nice color.
customer_reviews.author: LG knows It

customer_reviews.title: NON-SLIP
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed, non-slip on a vinyl bathroom floor beside the shower. It is soft and attractive as well.
customer_reviews.author: BixFan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to step out of shower onto this mat - ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to step out of shower onto this mat - it does not slip and is soft on the feet nd dries quickly from having a wet body stand on it drying off. I would recommend this mat to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Harmon-Schifferling

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it BUT IM constantly having to push it back in correct spot. It slides on floor.
customer_reviews.author: It's me

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft, but not great for water absorbance
customer_reviews.text: This bath at is super squishy, may be better for standing on while getting ready, but I bought mine to put outside my shower. Whenever I step on it the mat stays wet for a very long time and is not quick drying like other bath mats. It is of a nice quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality and nice neutral color
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I stand up to work at my computer. Soft, good quality and nice neutral color.
customer_reviews.author: smey

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable and good value
customer_reviews.text: Very plush and sturdy. The only demerit is that every footprint shows as you step out of the shower. However, I have gotten used to this effect and like the product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Sulli

customer_reviews.title: They look decent. They do retain water. If ...
customer_reviews.text: They look decent. They do retain water. If you take back to back showers in your family they will be standing in the water from the previous person. If that bothers you then do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug
customer_reviews.text: I had to use it to replace my old one, and this is such a great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Mom P

customer_reviews.title: For the money they’re decent bathroom rugs unless you’re handicapped or elderly as they can slide.
customer_reviews.text: Comfort, inexpensive, good mats. But not great as they tend to slide on tile. And the backing makes rugs slightly rigid. Liquid stains hard to get out but other than that very easy to clean with vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality very durable
customer_reviews.text: Once again amazon giving you the best at a price you can’t beat thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Zhowze

customer_reviews.title: 💜💣
customer_reviews.text: Feels soo good in front of my rocker recliner!! Not just for bathroom!! Do as you please and remember to think outside the box for your own comfort!! Perfect for tired feet!!! I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell W. Allred

customer_reviews.title: I like it! The color is very nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: Dries faster than similar memory foam products. I like it! The color is very nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Lighter color than expected but they are soft. Hopefully they retain their height with use.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t hold water for very long so it won’t mildew or have a weird smell after a while
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rugs!
customer_reviews.text: Best Amazon deal in a while! $14 for 4! They are slip resistant, thick, plush, and better than any memory foam rugs I’ve bought in any box store for $10 or more!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Side of Life

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Very soft and comfortable. I use it for the kitchen in front of the kitchen sink. Only reason its not 5 stars is because it slides around a lot. I would recommend getting some sort of rubber mat underneath it to hold it in place
customer_reviews.author: Luciano C.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. It’s cushy and absorbes a decent amount of water. Definitely better than using a towel.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Feet heaven
customer_reviews.text: A little small for a traditional bathmat. But makes it up threefold in feel. Uber comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Piaf fan

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: The best quality that I have found is at Bed, Bath, and Beyond. Purchasing locally, I never have any shipping charges.
customer_reviews.author: TGS

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price as prime day deal and bought set of 4 cheaper than Walmart sells just one. Very good quality. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LordBobbith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive, well-made bathmat. The green is a nice color and it's pleasantly cushiony to stand on. However, my primary reason for buying was the non-slip feature and the two I purchased started slipping within a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mat for price but could be a bit bigger
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic absorption and feel after a year of near every day usage. Could be a bit bigger, but still great bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, super absorbent, don't show dirt forever, easy to wash and dry, and very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Restif

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself to a little luxury at a great price! This memory foam bathmat feels so good ...
customer_reviews.text: Treat yourself to a little luxury at a great price! This memory foam bathmat feels so good on my feet. I have bought other memory foam bath mats but none are as comfy as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Baymihr

customer_reviews.title: Very plush
customer_reviews.text: This mat is great. Absorbs well and feels very plush under the feet. We bought it for a guest bath, but loved it so much we not have it in the master.
customer_reviews.author: Gina  Bayles

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for the bathroom, a little thicker then I thought but not to bad. Only problem I have with it is it doesn’t stick to the floor as well as the old one I had. Not that it moves when getting out the shower or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Non-Slip Memory Foam Bath Mat - Pack of 4, 18 x 28 Inches, Grey
feature_bullets: 4 Pack of Non-Slip Memory Foam Bath Mat 18'' x 28''
Bath mat with thick memory-foam core offers a dry and luxuriously comfortable place to stand
Super-absorbent microfiber fabric soaks up water like a sponge; holds 4 times its weight in water
Gray color coordinates with a wide range of bathroom decors
Dries exceptionally fast; seams for easy folding and compact storage
Features a non-slip mesh backing to prevent the mat from sliding; measures 18 x 28 inches; machine washable for hassle-free cleaning
Made in OEKO-TEX Standard 100 factory, an independent certification system that ensures textiles meet high safety and environmental standards.
